# Problem 1

Installation of package palmerpenguins

##Describe the penguin dataset
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
str(penguins)
nrow(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)
```
There are 8 variables in the penguin dataset.
The penguins data set contains 8 columns and 344 rows. 
The mean flipper length is 200.9152.
